item.title: @elonmusk: A year ago on inauguration day, a U.S. Border Patrol agent was shot dead in a shoot out in Vermont i...
item.description: A year ago on inauguration day, a U.S. Border Patrol agent was shot dead in a shoot out in Vermont involving a trans duo who are members of a trans death cult. One of the armed attackers, who also died, was a foreign national. There were no press conferences by any Democrats expressing sympathy for the federal agent, unlike the mass outpouring of support for the accused violent Tren de Aragua suspects in Portland who allegedly tried to run over Border Patrol agents.ngocomment.com

item.description: If it werenâ€™t for X, the media would have NEVER reported the video showing Renee Good trying to drive over a police officer. For the good of our country, I encourage every person that has the means to become an X Premium supporter. X can count on me to be a lifelong supporter.

item.title: @elonmusk: Can someone help me understand this: - almost every country has banned mail-in voting, but not the U...
item.description: Can someone help me understand this: - almost every country has banned mail-in voting, but not the US - whistleblowers report fraudsters going door to door, collecting up to 9 ballots per apartment, for whole complexes, and sending them in - republicans have both houses of congress but haven't managed to pass any bill to stop this This is a mortal flaw in our electoral system. Why in the world hasn't this been stopped?!
